channel.title: Need help i can connect to my server but others cant
channel.description: i am an new when it comes to servers but i have followed this guide and done exactly what it says. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,285415.0.html but when i run my server i can connect using my no-ip adress but no one else can. :eek: my no-ip is orisainscape.no-ip.biz i am running a linksys broadband router and have followed the port forwarding - making my starting and ending ports both 43594 with a tcp protocol i have also downloaded the no-ipduc to run my no-ip. as well i have tried 2 different server sources and have created both my Path and classpaths correctly. here are the 2 server sources. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,292673.0.html google scape v2 http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,293880.0.html finalityscape server 1.0 any help would be very much appreciated and if you help you will get a staff position on my server if you would like to play. :cool:

item.title: Need help i can connect to my server but others cant
item.dc:creator: @Orisain Orisain
item.description:
@Orisain wrote:

yes i have unlocked the port i want on my fire wall but i dont know if i have port forwarded correctly as for the static ip adress i believe i might have done that though i am not sure for the port forwarding i would like some help i am using a linksys router.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help i can connect to my server but others cant

item.title: Need help i can connect to my server but others cant
item.dc:creator: @vrscape vrscape
item.description:
@vrscape wrote:

did configure your firewall? If not, you got to unblock the ports on your firewall(s).

Read full topic

item.title: Need help i can connect to my server but others cant
item.dc:creator: @Dominionscape Dominionscape
item.description:
@Dominionscape wrote:

Ifu have a router then u need to portforward, if u dont, then u have to use No-Ip to set up an IP for ur server

Read full topic

item.title: Need help i can connect to my server but others cant
item.dc:creator: @Orisain Orisain
item.description:
@Orisain wrote:

i am an new when it comes to servers but i have followed this guide and done exactly what it says. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,285415.0.html
but when i run my server i can connect using my no-ip adress but no one else can. :eek:
my no-ip is orisainscape.no-ip.biz
i am running a linksys broadband router and have followed the port forwarding - making my starting and ending ports both 43594 with a tcp protocol
i have also downloaded the no-ipduc to run my no-ip.
as well i have tried 2 different server sources and have created both my Path and classpaths correctly.
here are the 2 server sources.
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,292673.0.html google scape v2
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,293880.0.html finalityscape server 1.0
any help would be very much appreciated and if you help you will get a staff position on my server if you would like to play.

Read full topic
